messages.subject: Re: Do you do this?
messages.msgSnippet: Here s my answers, sorry I had to add a few to the original choices. Claudia who if she EVER gets over her writers block and actually POSTS to FFN would have
messages.messageBody:
Here's my answers, sorry I had to add a few to the original choices.

Claudia
who if she EVER gets over her writers block and actually POSTS to FFN would
have the pen name CEEGEE


1) While writing you... ???? I have to add a D. answer, none of the above.
Call me old fashioned but I actually WRITE a fic out with pencil and spiral
note pad BEFORE I put it into my computer.

2) After writing you... ???? Another D. answer here, once it's in my computer
I send it to my beta reader, I do the proofreading before I put it in my
computer.


3) When you get reviews you... ???
b. Wow a review! Got to drop everything and read the review quick! Finally an
answer I don't have to add to the quiz!!!!

4) When you get a critique you... ???
b. Hmmm... I better check up on this and see if there's any basis
and then correct if need be... Two listed answers in a row!! We're on a roll
here!

5) When it comes to updates you... ???
c. Update? Does the word exist. Oh maybe later after I get this
great idea or if this writers block ever goes away. Unless it's a one shot,
I've had the worst case of writers block in history for over two years!!!

6) An idea pops in your head that would make for a good story..
you...
c. STOP! NO MORE IDEAS! Baka Brain! Blasted a fore mentioned writers block is
manifested in not getting enough of any ONE fic to actually write so much as
a chapter!

7) You published something, you think it's decent... So you... D. Once I get
it back from my beta I post it to whichever group it's fandom would make it
appropriate for, I've YET to post anything to FFN.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
